Are you ready to enjoy the fastest 4G network? we will help you to get ready:
•Check if your SIM card and device are 4G enabled
•Check our latest 4G devices and order through Orange e-shop (online)
•Know more about 4G and the difference with 3G

And be ready to enjoy 4G speed and use the internet with no surprises where you will receive consumption alerts as Push notifications through My Internet Alerts :
•Select between 3 different alert plans (default, medium and heavy) from My internet pages alert sign
•Receive consumption thresholds push notifications based on your selected alert plan
•Receive roaming data packages consumption Push notification

In this release:
•Users on Eagle tariffs can monitor their inclusive minutes, SMSs and their tariff limit if available
•Users on Dolphin buckets can monitor their inclusive units , SMSs and favorite number consumption and any carried over units or minutes
•Users on Panther buckets can monitor their inclusive minutes and SMSs and any carried over minutes

Pay your & or others Orange Home internet (DSL) bills using credit/debit card from anywhere. Simply login- select Bills-Home Internet- scan your card and pay

If you have an Orange line that stopped working, re-activate it through My Orange Side menu- select “Reconnect your line” option

Enhancement on login through hotspot connection

Stay entertained on the GO with a new “Entertainment menu” where you can access Orange TV, Abtal Africa, Orange Games and more

Special menu has a new design, easily know the money value of your points & redeem any number of points on the spot from Orange Online shop, Orange Shops or our partners
